name: Ambulance Chauffeur Simulator
description:
We know that you've heard the phrase that every second counts.

Ambulance Chauffeur Simulator is a simulation game where your mission is to be an ambulance driver. As a driver you will save lives together with the doctors, making sure that the ambulance always arrives on time.

You have a green light from the police, because you have to break any traffic rule to do your job well. The more lives saved, the cleaner your karma will be. Always be prepared because the call can come at any time!

Game Features :
- More than 10 levels
- 3 equipped Ambulance cars
- Daily Reward
- Missions are on a limited time
